title: Iranian Climber Elnaz Rekabi Is Welcomed by Crowds in Tehran
description: Elnaz Rekabi, whose appearance without a head scarf at an event in Seoul raised fears about her future, was welcomed home by crowds in Tehran. Her motivations, and her fate, however, remain unclear.
dc:creator: Euan Ward
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

media:description: Elnaz Rekabi competing at the Asian Championships in Seoul on Sunday, in a photograph provided by the International Federation of Sport Climbing.
